detaileddescription.para: iccV5DspObsToV4Dsp converts ICC v5 Display Observer profiles into ICC v4 Display profiles. This enables broader compatibility with systems and applications that only support ICC v4.

listitem.para:
âœ… ICC v5 â†’ v4 Conversion
Converts observer-specific tags to legacy v4-compatible structures

âœ… Display Profile Simplification
Translates spectral viewing conditions into ICC v4 colorimetric approximations

âœ… CLI Integration
Usable in batch pipelines and profile pre-processing

âœ… Metadata Preservation
Retains device class, rendering intent, and profile description

sect1.title: ðŸš€ Usage
sect1.para: Converts the input.icc (v5 observer-based) profile into a legacy v4 format written to output.icc.

listitem.para: Ensures ICC v5 profiles can be interpreted by legacy apps
Enables testing fallback behavior in color pipelines
Supports roundtrip simulations for v4-only workflows

sect1.title: ðŸ”’ Notes

listitem.para: Only applicable to Display class profiles with observer extensions
Conversion may lose fidelity of original observer data
